#summary A JUnit-based UI-testing framework for testing Eclipse/RCP, SWT and Swing applications.

= Introduction =

[http://code.google.com/webtoolkit/download.html WindowTester] is a free UI-testing tool available from [http://code.google.com/webtoolkit/overview.html Google].
